title: Alan Watt - Cutting Through The Matrix - week 27, 2008
description:
CUTTING THROUGH the MATRIX with ALAN WATT


(( ( Commercial Free ) )) ... ID3v2 Tagged ...



In all ages, in all lands, there have been those who seek truth. This seeking
is an individual&#039;s search for something more than self, and much more than the
confines of this worldly system. It is the seeker, who understands there is more
than what meets the eye, who is not afraid and makes the choice to go into the
unknown. The process of awaking has begun, the discovery is underway.

2008 - Alan Watt - A Course in Deprogramming



Alan Watt, a leading researcher into hidden history, ancient civilizations,
and their influence on modern society, speaks on the global agenda of the
ruling elite, the open conspiracy, the old world order made new, the temporary
police state leading to the chip implant, and much more.

Alan Watt&#039;s interviews on CuttingThroughTheMatrix are absolutely priceless.
His broadcasts are in a class of their own. In a world full of clones, his powerfully
original presentation and unique message undoubtedly makes him a target.
 <a href="
http://www.cuttingthroughthematrix.com/" rel="nofollow" target="_NEW">
http://www.cuttingthroughthematrix.com/</a>



This Week: week 26, 2008

1. June302008 - LIVEonRBN 134 - The Elites War upon the Sheeple.mp3

  "The Elites&#039; War upon the Sheeple
   Has been Shouted from the Highest Steeple,
   Yet the Sheeple Persist to Play the Fool,
   Bleat a lot, and Grow the Wool,
   More the Wool becomes Synthetic,
   By the Children of Science, Ergo Genetic,
   To Warm Their Masters and Supply the Mutton--
   Read the Books by Professor Anthony Sutton"


2. July022008 - LIVEonRBN 135 - The People are All at Sixes and Seven.mp3

  "The People are All at Sixes and Seven,
   As To Whether This System began Nine-Eleven,
   Truth is, We&#039;ve been Guided Down through the Ages,
   By Hidden Masters, Wise Men and Sages,
   Become Involved, Instead of Detaching,
   Be Wise and Conscious, Instead of Reacting"


3. July042008 - LIVEonRBN 136 - Prometheus-Lucifer as Known to Some.mp3

  "Prometheus-Lucifer as Known to Some,
   Brings Down to Man the Light of the Sun,
   Fomenting a Plan so Brilliant with Light,
   Those Who Serve are Bedazzled in Sight,
   A Plan so Brutal, Oh What a Cost!
   A Far Cry from Milton&#039;s Paradise Lost,
   Yet Milton was a Brother Ma-Sonic,
   His Verbal Gifts Birthed Pictures Symbolic"
